replies.bodyText:
I guess, we could also write query.toUpperCase(Locale.ROOT).contains("WITH SECURITY_ENFORCED").
Btw. - are multiple spaces between "WITH" and "SECURITY_ENFORCED" allowed? If yes, then we probably need to use a regex. In that case, we should create a precompiled pattern constant.
